Note

This activity is fully described. Click a decomposition, activity, or input/output/control/mechanism for descriptions and examples that are relevant for designing in a circular economy.

  • Decomposition
  • ICOM

Activity-in-Diagram: Design Product

Description

Identify and conceptualize a marketable product, and create the complete description of it [1 - 3]

Owning Diagram: A0: Produce in a circular economy

Decomposition

A1: Design Product

Input

designer/design team knowledge

market data

previous design iterations

material availability data

Output

product design

product business model

instructions from product

design bill of materials

product model

physical model

Control

company dfx goals

design constraints

technological constraints

company business strategy

standards

treatment at end of life data

use and consumption data

product data

regulations

government incentives

Mechanism

design software

emerging technologies

design guides
